title: AI chatbot-integrated nursing simulation-based education course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Simulation Experience and Advanced Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced nursing simulation training with AI chatbot interactions in a digital device-based simulation environment

learning_goals: Apply six prompt design domains (clarity, contextual appropriateness, interactivity, feedback provision, evaluability, and ethical considerations) when designing simulation scenarios using AI chatbots

Measure AI chatbot performance against eight evaluation criteria (accuracy, responsiveness, consistency, realism, pedagogical utility, user-friendliness, stability, and security) to derive improvement strategies
Analyze issues arising during the integration of simulations and AI chatbots through formative assessment and apply iterative feedback at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
